prompt: dame una version recolorizada de esta misma imagen

structured_prompt.short_description: A recolored split portrait of two stylized anime-like characters, each occupying one half of the frame. The left character features warm, earthy tones with green hair and brown eyes, while the right character is depicted with cool, ethereal colors, featuring light blue hair and blue eyes. Both characters maintain their distinct facial markings and intense expressions, creating a contrasting yet harmonious visual.

objects.description: The left half of a stylized character's face, featuring green hair with sharp, angular strands and a determined expression. The eye is brown with a dark pupil, and there are distinct facial markings under the eye and on the cheek, rendered in a darker shade of green. A small, subtle scar or marking is visible on the lower lip.
objects.relationship: Part of a split portrait, contrasting with the character on the right.
objects.shape_and_color: Angular shapes, dominant green and brown tones.
objects.appearance_details: Stylized anime aesthetic with sharp details.
objects.clothing: Partial view of dark clothing, possibly a collar.

objects.description: The right half of a stylized character's face, featuring light blue hair with sharp, angular strands and an intense, focused expression. The eye is blue with a dark pupil, and there are distinct facial markings under the eye and on the cheek, rendered in a darker shade of blue. A small, subtle scar or marking is visible on the lower lip.
objects.relationship: Part of a split portrait, contrasting with the character on the left.
objects.shape_and_color: Angular shapes, dominant light blue and blue tones.
objects.appearance_details: Stylized anime aesthetic with sharp details.

aesthetics.composition: Symmetrical split portrait, centered, with both characters' faces filling the majority of the frame.
